title: Full-Stack Web Development Intern
description: Develop new user-facing features Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability Collaborate with designers and backend engineers

title: Data Science Intern
description: Collect and clean large datasets Build predictive models using Python Prepare visual reports for stakeholders

title: Mobile App Development Intern
description: Develop cross-platform apps with React Native Implement push notifications Collaborate with UX designers

title: Cybersecurity Intern
description: Monitor network traffic for threats Assist in penetration testing Document security incidents

title: Graphic Design Intern
description: Design marketing collateral Create social media graphics Assist with brand style guidelines

title: Plumber Apprentice
description: Assist senior plumbers in installing pipes and fixtures Learn to diagnose and repair leaks Handle basic maintenance of plumbing tools

title: Electrician Trainee
description: Assist in wiring and electrical installations Support routine maintenance of industrial equipment Learn troubleshooting of electrical circuits

title: Welder Intern
description: Assist senior welders with MIG and TIG welding Prepare and clean metal surfaces Maintain welding equipment

title: Automotive Service Technician Intern
description: Assist in vehicle diagnostics and routine servicing Learn oil change and brake inspection procedures Maintain service records

title: Refrigeration & AC Mechanic Apprentice
description: Assist in installation of air-conditioning units Learn routine maintenance and gas charging Help troubleshoot cooling system issues
